title.rendered: Ed Sheeran visits Smile Foundation’s centre in Mumbai

content.rendered: Smile Foundation children in Mumbai had a once-in-a-lifetime experience as the global music icon Ed Sheeran visited our Mission Education centre. He shared his world with our children, narrating his experiences, singing with them, and motivating them to follow their dreams. Meeting achievers, especially young people who have made it big from humble backgrounds, is always an encouraging opportunity for the children and opens up a whole new world of possibilities for them.
